::SnowCat::

She runs and starts to run in a zigzag pattern trying to evade this 
bot after her. She turned and fires her lazars again at the bot 
aftrer her. She was starting to slow. She was wearing down from her 
long trip and then, this.  She turned left, then jumped right and 
kept going.  She turned and went straight in the direction she was 
headed for.  She hoped she would make it to her destination before 
this bot killed her.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DeathScythe/Ramulus::
> 
> With the help of his jets, DeathScythe slowly gained on SnowCat. 
His 
> shoulders were getting bloodied up from the branches, but he wasn't 
paying 
> attention to them. He roars, getting closer to SnowCat.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus stops as he hears a roar, coming from somewhere in front of 
him. 
> Checking his scanners quickly, he gallops off after DeathScythe.
